mapper.sql: ) R1 ORDER BY RESVE_DE DESC,REG_DT DESC LIMIT #{rowPerPage, jdbcType=INTEGER} OFFSET #{startRow, jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT RESVE_NO, STTUS_CODE_NM, DATE_FORMAT(T.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS REG_DT_STR, CASE WHEN ADM_EMPNO IS NOT NULL THEN '관리자' WHEN ADM_EMPNO IS NULL THEN CASE REG_EMPNO WHEN #{empno} THEN HNAME WHEN 'SYSTEM' THEN 'SYSTEM' ELSE '구성원' END END AS REG_EMPNM FROM ( SELECT HIST.RESVE_NO, STTUS_CODE, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM CMMN_CODE WHERE CODE_TYL='STS' AND CODE=HIST.STTUS_CODE) AS STTUS_CODE_NM, HIST.REG_EMPNO, HIST.REG_DT, PRSN.HNAME, ADM.EMPNO AS ADM_EMPNO FROM RESVE_HIST HIST LEFT JOIN inf_person_info_rcv PRSN ON HIST.REG_EMPNO = PRSN.EMPNO LEFT JOIN CHARGER ADM ON HIST.REG_EMPNO = ADM.EMPNO WHERE RESVE_NO = #{resveNo} ) T ORDER BY REG_DT
